text: Love that I'm working late for the third night in a row ðŸ™ƒ
rationale: Sarcastic 'love' + ðŸ™ƒ, clearly frustrated and stressed.

text: I got promoted today and I'm excited, but honestly terrified I'll mess it up.
rationale: Positive event + explicit fear/anxiety.

text: Apparently my coping mechanism is just laughing at my own burnout ðŸ˜‚
rationale: Humor over clear burnout; both positive affect and negative state.

text: I'm not sad, I'm just... tired of everything.
rationale: Resignation/fatigue more than acute stress.

text: Objectively nothing went wrong today, but I still feel on edge for no reason.
rationale: Baseline okay, but internal tension/anxiety.

text: Today was chaos but the good kind, I was running around all day and weirdly thriving.
rationale: Chaotic but clearly enjoyed; high arousal, positive frame.

text: Nothing special happened, but I actually felt really present and calm for once.
rationale: Low arousal, positive mood.

text: My brain is screaming but my face is doing the 'I'm fine ðŸ™‚' thing again.
rationale: Contrast between internal panic and external mask.

text: I finished everything on my to-do list but somehow still feel behind.
rationale: Achievement overshadowed by persistent pressure.

text: Honestly, today was aggressively mid.
rationale: Indifferent/flat, no strong affect.

text: I'm quietly proud of myself for not spiraling this time.
rationale: Relief and contained pride, low arousal.

text: I talked about everything in therapy and now I'm emotionally drained but lighter.
rationale: Relief + exhaustion, not really high stress.

text: It feels like my body is on fast-forward and my brain is on pause.
rationale: Dysregulated, anxious energy.

text: Had a meltdown this morning, but the rest of the day was surprisingly peaceful.
rationale: Big negative event followed by genuinely calm recovery.

text: I'm lowkey scared about next week, but trying to trust that I'll figure it out.
rationale: Anxiety moderated by some optimism; still anticipatory stress.

text: My heart's racing and I can't tell if I'm excited or terrified.
rationale: Ambiguous valence, clearly high arousal/physiological activation.

text: I'm so done with everything but also too tired to care.
rationale: Burnout/defeat; low arousal, negative mood.

text: Today was one long social battery drain, but I'm glad I went.
rationale: Positive appraisal + clear exhaustion.

text: I keep joking about my anxiety like it's a personality trait ðŸ˜‚
rationale: Humor layered on persistent anxious state.

text: Mentally, I'm lying face-down on the floor, but I did every single thing I had to do.
rationale: Functional but emotionally wiped; low energy, negative mood.

text: Weirdly, everything that should have stressed me out today just... didn't.
rationale: Unexpected calm in situations normally stressful.

text: I feel like I'm watching my own life on a screen instead of actually living it.
rationale: Dissociation / detachment, low arousal.

text: My messages are chaos but my room is clean, so that's something.
rationale: Some control/accomplishment amidst social/mental chaos.

text: No breakdowns today. The bar is low but I'll take the win.
rationale: Low standards, but genuinely positive/relieved.

text: Everyone keeps telling me I'm doing great, but I feel like I'm barely hanging on.
rationale: External praise vs internal overwhelm; stress dominates.
